message.name: INF_HEARING_CASE_APPROVAL_FV_SCHEDULEHEARINGCOMMENT
message.locale: A hearing needs to be scheduled for the case.

message.name: INF_HEARING_CASE_APPROVAL_FV_APPROVEHEARINGSUBJECT
message.locale: This Hearing Case has been approved.

message.name: INF_HEARING_CASE_APPROVAL_FV_APPROVEHEARINGREASON
message.locale: This case has been approved on %1s. Please proceed to the case home page to review the details of this hearing case

message.name: INF_HEARING_CASE_APPROVAL_FV_REJECTHEARINGSUBJECT
message.locale: This Hearing Case has been rejected.

message.name: INF_HEARING_CASE_APPROVAL_FV_TIMELYINDICATORTRUE
message.locale: The Timely Indicator for this Hearing Case is true.

message.name: INF_HEARING_CASE_APPROVAL_FV_TIMELYINDICATORFALSE
message.locale: The Timely Indicator for this Hearing Case is false.

message.name: INF_HEARING_CASE_APPROVAL_FV_REJECTHEARINGREASON
message.locale: This case has been rejected on %1s. Please proceed to the case home page to review the details of this hearing case

message.name: ERR_HEARING_CASE_APPROVAL_FV_CASENOTSUBMITTED
message.locale: This case has not been submitted for approval and cannot be either approved or rejected.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_CASE_APPROVAL_FV_CASEALREADYAPPROVED
message.locale: This case has already been approved by a user with approval rights.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_CASE_APPROVAL_FV_CASENOTOPEN
message.locale: Only cases with a status of 'Open' can be submitted for approval.
